---
id: get-monetization-transaction
title: "Get Transaction"
description: "Get a monetization transaction for the given monetization team by the given transaction id. Successful request will return a `200 - Success` response. Further details about how the [Service to Service functionality](/monetization/studio-as-purchase-server) works and can be used to operate your own purchase server is recommended reading prior to implementing this endpoint."
sidebar_label: "Get Transaction"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true

---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Transaction"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/s2s/monetization-teams/{monetization-team-id}/transactions/{transaction-id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get a monetization transaction for the given monetization team by the given transaction id. Successful request will return a `200 - Success` response. Further details about how the [Service to Service functionality](/monetization/studio-as-purchase-server) works and can be used to operate your own purchase server is recommended reading prior to implementing this endpoint.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"monetization-team-id","in":"path","description":"Monetization Team ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":1},{"name":"transaction-id","in":"path","description":"Transaction ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":2}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful Request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Get Transaction","properties":{"data":{"description":"Array containing transaction objects.","type":"array","items":{"title":"Transaction Object Show","properties":{"id":{"description":"Unique transaction id.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":1234},"gateway_uuid":{"description":"The universally unique ID (UUID) that represents a unique tranasction with the payment gateway.","type":"string","example":"123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000"},"gateway_name":{"description":"The gateway that processed the transaction.","type":"string","example":"tilia"},"account_id":{"description":"The unique monetization account id that actioned the transaction.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"12345"},"gross_amount":{"description":"The gross amount of the transaction.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":199},"net_amount":{"description":"The net amount of the transaction.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":199},"platform_fee":{"description":"The platform fee of the transaction.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":20},"gateway_fee":{"description":"The gateway fee of the transaction.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":30},"tax":{"description":"The tax amount of the transaction.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":0},"tax_type":{"description":"The tax type on the processed transaction.","type":"string","example":"sales"},"currency":{"description":"The currency type on the processed transaction.","type":"string","example":"usd"},"tokens":{"description":"The amount of virtual currency associated with the transaction. Will be omitted when no tokens are involved.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":0},"transaction_type":{"description":"The transaction status type on the processed transaction. I.e. is it paid, pending, refunded or cleared.","type":"string","example":"paid"},"monetization_type":{"description":"The monetizaton type on the processed transaction. I.e. is it fiat, tokens or external.","type":"string","example":"paid"},"purchase_date":{"description":"The beginging purchase date the transaction started on in a human reabled date time stamp.","type":"string","example":"2024-10-07 02:29:11"},"created_at":{"description":"The timestamp of date the transaction status was recorded in micro time precsion.","type":"string","example":"1728268151123456"},"payment_method":{"description":"Array containing payment method objects.","type":"array","items":{"title":"Payment Method Object","description":"Contains Payment Method data.","properties":{"name":{"description":"The pretty name of the payment method that was used.","type":"string","example":"Visa ending in 1111"},"id":{"description":"The UUID of the payment method id that was used.","type":"string","example":"123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000"},"amount":{"description":"The amount the payment method was charged.","type":"integer","example":199},"display_amount":{"description":"A pretty string of the amount the payment method was charged.","type":"string","example":"USD 1.99"}},"type":"object"}},"items":{"description":"Array containing Transaction items objects.","type":"array","items":{"title":"Transaction Items Object","description":"Contains Items Records data.","properties":{"id":{"description":"Unique identifier for the transaction.","type":"integer","example":1234},"gateway_uuid":{"description":"UUID of the payment gateway.","type":"string","format":"uuid"},"gateway_name":{"description":"Name of the payment gateway.","type":"string","example":"tilia"},"sale_price":{"description":"Sale price of the item.","type":"number","format":"float"},"gateway_fee":{"description":"Fee charged by the gateway.","type":"number","format":"float"},"platform_fee":{"description":"Fee charged by the platform.","type":"number","format":"float"},"currency":{"description":"Currency code for the transaction.","type":"string","example":"usd"},"tokens":{"description":"Number of tokens involved in the transaction.","type":"integer"},"token_team_id":{"description":"ID of the token team.","type":"integer"},"sale_type":{"description":"Type of sale, e.g., bought or sold.","type":"string","example":"bought"},"monetization_type":{"description":"Type of monetization, e.g., fiat.","type":"string","example":"fiat"},"transaction_type":{"description":"Type of transaction, e.g., paid or cleared.","type":"string","example":"paid"},"purchase_date":{"description":"Date and time of the purchase.","type":"string","format":"date-time"},"created_at":{"description":"Creation timestamp with microseconds.","type":"integer","format":"int64","example":1728268151123456},"line_items":{"description":"Array of line item objects.","type":"array","items":{"properties":{"mod_id":{"description":"Mod ID.","type":"integer","example":1234},"game_id":{"description":"Game ID.","type":"integer","example":4567},"buyer_id":{"description":"Buyer ID.","type":"integer","example":8910},"mod_name":{"description":"Name of the mod.","type":"string","example":"my mod"},"game_name":{"description":"Name of the game.","type":"string","example":"my game"},"buyer_name":{"description":"Name of the buyer.","type":"string","example":"buyers name"}},"type":"object"}},"breakdown":{"description":"Array containing breakdown of revenues.","type":"array","items":{"properties":{"platform":{"properties":{"revenue":{"description":"Platform revenue.","type":"number","format":"float","example":99}},"type":"object"},"store":{"description":"Array of store revenue objects.","type":"array","items":{"properties":{"revenue":{"description":"Store revenue.","type":"number","format":"float","example":99},"users":{"description":"Array of user revenue details.","type":"array","items":{"properties":{"account_name":{"description":"Account name.","type":"string","example":"name"},"account_id":{"description":"Account ID.","type":"integer","example":123},"revenue":{"description":"User revenue.","type":"number","format":"float","example":99}},"type":"object"}}},"type":"object"}}},"type":"object"}},"revenue":{"description":"Total revenue for the transaction.","type":"number","format":"float","example":99}},"type":"object"}},"line_items":{"description":"Array containing line item objects.","type":"array","items":{"title":"Line Items Object","description":"Contains line item data.","properties":{"game_id":{"description":"The game id of the transaction.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":0},"buyer_id":{"description":"The buyer id of the transaction.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":0},"game_name":{"description":"The name of the game the purchase occured on.","type":"string","example":"my game"},"buyer_name":{"description":"The username of the buyer.","type":"string","example":"smith"},"token_name":{"description":"The pretty name of the virtual currency used in the transaction.","type":"string","example":"mio"},"token_pack_id":{"description":"The id of the virtual currency pack used in the transaction.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":0},"token_pack_name":{"description":"The pretty name of the virtual currency pack used in the transaction.","type":"string","example":"200 Pack"}},"type":"object"}}},"type":"object"}}},"type":"object"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
